channel.title: The Intoxicated Hare's Doodle Scroll
channel.description:
I'm a hipster making my sketchbook all original. :hipsterkitty:
[img]http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2012/035/4/8/if_i_could_describe_this_i_would__by_kasuralixa-d4om987.jpg[/img] -Done with Tablet
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg404/scaled.php?server=404&filename=charmanderg.png&res=medium[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg10/scaled.php?server=10&filename=lunalovegood.png&res=medium[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg441/scaled.php?server=441&filename=littleredridinghood.png&res=medium[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/035/2/0/reflection_of_foxes_by_kasuralixa-d4om6lb.png[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2012/035/9/a/purple_unicorn_by_kasuralixa-d4om3ue.png[/img] - Done with Mouse
[img]http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2012/035/0/1/kami_by_kasuralixa-d4om43g.png[/img] - Done with Mouse
[img]http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/035/4/5/the_moons_calling_by_kasuralixa-d4om4xg.png[/img] - Done with Mouse
[img]http://a3.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-snc7/403907_314726905231453_100000824374233_805795_1072945624_n.jpg[/img] -Done with Tablet
[img]http://a2.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/420205_328249130545897_100000824374233_834484_1985293563_n.jpg[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://sphotos.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash4/408880_328810023823141_100000824374233_836240_1536306645_n.jpg[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://sphotos.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash4/422803_319158101455000_100000824374233_815003_1311928387_n.jpg[/img] - Done with Tablet
http://youtu.be/mySuD4My0-s - Video I made, speedpaint of the girl and the rose above.
[img]http://sphotos.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-snc7/431407_331756996861777_100000824374233_842298_1531069575_n.jpg[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://sphotos.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-snc7/418528_331779186859558_100000824374233_842332_802960873_n.jpg[/img] - Done with Tablet
[img]http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2012/078/4/b/eyes_upon_the_moon_by_kasuralixa-d4tc65k.jpg[/img]
Just to clarify, these are NOT all RECENT. I used to have to use my mouse instead of a tablet because I don't really have a stable income or anything (only 14) and just recently got a tablet for Christmas. I couldn't just start off with the best. I was using my mouse and gimp :/ I got a tablet though and torrented photoshop so I'm hopefully going to improve. I realize this makes me an inefficient newfag.. Sorry v_v
other than that.. OPINIONS, GO!

item.title: The Intoxicated Hare's Doodle Scroll
item.dc:creator: @TheDrunkBunny TheDrunkBunny
item.description:
@TheDrunkBunny wrote:

Frell:

oh, then you have plenty of time. Look arount at http://www.ctrlpaint.com/ and look for the beginner tuts on how to set up your brushes

Thanks, I meant to head over there a while ago but forgot the link ha… v_v

Also, updated OP. Check out the new drawings, cigarettes. c:

Read full topic

item.title: The Intoxicated Hare's Doodle Scroll
item.dc:creator: @TheDrunkBunny TheDrunkBunny
item.description:
@TheDrunkBunny wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:21, topic:431848”]Oh! missed that, saw replies about a mouse

STOP MOUSE PAINTING THEN SIR[/quote]

I am a ma’am ;; And I just recently got a tablet for christmas. After each picture I say what I did it with. That’s just a collaboration of all my work. Not my recents. All my recents are done with tablet. But 2011 all I had was a mouse. Sorry to disappoint ;; I’m not planning on being hired as a concept artist soon, I’m only 14, but I’m working at it.

Read full topic

item.title: The Intoxicated Hare's Doodle Scroll
item.dc:creator: @TheDrunkBunny TheDrunkBunny
item.description:
@TheDrunkBunny wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:10, topic:431848”][quote]
I used to consider myself a cartoonist but now I’m trying to get into realistic concept art. It’s kind of a hard transition but I’m making some progress. Just gotta get out of my outlining habit haha
[/quote]
Good to hear, it is hard to get out of the outlining habit but just try marking it on another layer.[/quote]
I do everything on seperate layers, so I might just go to the color layer and make the outline invisible and go from there. I dunno, I’ll try and post.

Read full topic

item.title: The Intoxicated Hare's Doodle Scroll
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I used to consider myself a cartoonist but now I'm trying to get into realistic concept art. It's kind of a hard transition but I'm making some progress. Just gotta get out of my outlining habit haha
Good to hear, it is hard to get out of the outlining habit but just try marking it on another layer.

item.title: The Intoxicated Hare's Doodle Scroll
item.dc:creator: @TheDrunkBunny TheDrunkBunny
item.description:
@TheDrunkBunny wrote:

Thanks everyone
and,

amy_webb:

Looking good, try make things look a little more realistic or are you going for more of that obvious cartoon drawing? Good job.

I used to consider myself a cartoonist but now I’m trying to get into realistic concept art. It’s kind of a hard transition but I’m making some progress. Just gotta get out of my outlining habit haha

Read full topic
